tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE products_feedback (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    product_type VARCHAR(20),
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers_feedback(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE product_improvements (
    improvement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    improvement_description TEXT,
    product_id INT,
    improvement_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products_feedback(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    rating INT,
    rating_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers_feedback(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products_feedback(product_id)
);
